module.name: LCLProc
module.short: Useful lower level helper functions and classes

element.name: TMethodList
element.short: A list for method references.

element.name: TMethodList.Count
element.short: Checked number of Items, can be called with a non-existent object.

element.name: TMethodList.NextDownIndex
element.short: Checked decrement of Index, can be called with a non-existent object.
element.descr: The resulting Index is lower than Count.

element.name: TMethodList.NextDownIndex.Result
element.short: True when the Index is valid.

element.name: TMethodList.NextDownIndex.Index
element.short: The decremented Index, or -1 if the object doesn't exist.

element.name: TMethodList.IndexOf
element.short: Returns the list index of AMethod.

element.name: TMethodList.IndexOf.Result
element.short: The list index, or -1 if not found or the list doesn't exist.

element.name: TMethodList.IndexOf.AMethod
element.short: The method to find.

element.name: TMethodList.Delete
element.short: Removes the indexed Item.

element.name: TMethodList.Remove
element.short: Removes the first occurence of AMethod from the list.

element.name: TMethodList.Add
element.short: Adds AMethod to the list, as the first or last member.

element.name: TMethodList.Add.AsLast
element.short: Add as first (False) or last (True) member.

element.name: TMethodList.Insert
element.short: Inserts AMethod at Index.

element.name: TMethodList.Move
element.short: Moves an Item within the list.

element.name: TMethodList.RemoveAllMethodsOfObject
element.short: Deletes all occurences of methods of AnObject from the list.

element.name: TMethodList.RemoveAllMethodsOfObject.AnObject
element.short: The object whose methods shall be removed.

element.name: TMethodList.CallNotifyEvents
element.short: Invokes all methods in the list, as notification handlers.
element.descr: All listed methods must take exactly one argument of type TObject!

element.name: TMethodList.CallNotifyEvents.Sender
element.short: The reference to pass as the argument to all methods.

element.name: TMethodList.Items
element.short: Indexed access to the methods in the list.

element.name: TStackTracePointers
element.short: A dynamic pointer array type.

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo
element.short: A node in TDebugLCLItems, holding information about a heap object.

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo.Item
element.short: The address of the item.

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo.IsDestroyed
element.short: True when the item has been destroyed.

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo.Info
element.short: A descriptive string

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo.CreationStack
element.short: Stack trace at creation of the object

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo.DestructionStack
element.short: Stack trace at destruction of the object

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo.AsString
element.short: All information about the object.

element.name: TDebugLCLItemInfo.AsString.WithStackTraces
element.short: True means include stack traces.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems
element.short: A list describing dynamically allocated (and destroyed) memory objects.
element.descr: The list holds descriptive information about the object, and stack traces of its creation and destruction.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.FItems
element.short: The list entries, organized as an AVL tree.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.Create
element.short: Assigns TheName to the list.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.Create.TheName
element.short: The descriptive name of the list.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.FindInfo
element.short: Returns information about an item, optionally creating an entry if not found.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.FindInfo.Result
element.short: The item information, or Nil if none was found or created.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.FindInfo.p
element.short: The address of the item to find.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.FindInfo.CreateIfNotExists
element.short: True means create an according list entry, if none existed yet.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.IsDestroyed
element.short: True when the item has been created and destroyed.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.IsDestroyed.Result
element.short: True when destroyed, False when alive or not listed.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.IsDestroyed.p
element.short: The address to find.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.IsCreated
element.short: True when the item is alive.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.IsCreated.Result
element.short: True when the item is listed and has not yet been destroyed.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.IsCreated.p
element.short: The address to find.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.MarkCreated
element.short: Checked insert of an item.
element.errors: GDB exception 'RaiseDoubleCreated' when the address is already in use.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.MarkCreated.Result
element.short: The info object describing the address.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.MarkCreated.p
element.short: The address to add.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.MarkCreated.InfoText
element.short: Descriptive text about the item.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.MarkDestroyed
element.short: Checked destruction notification.

ul.li: GDB exception 'TDebugLCLItems.MarkDestroyed' when the item was not yet created.
GDB exception 'RaiseDoubleDestroyed' when the item was already destroyed.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.MarkDestroyed.p
element.short: The address to mark as destroyed.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.GetInfo
element.short: Returns textual information about an object.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.GetInfo.Result
element.short: The descriptive string.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.GetInfo.p
element.short: The address to find.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.GetInfo.WithStackTraces
element.short: True means include stack traces.

element.name: TDebugLCLItems.Name
element.short: The descriptive name of the list.

element.name: TLineInfoCacheItem
element.short: A record containing an address/description pair.

element.name: TLineInfoCacheItem.Addr
element.short: The address to describe.

element.name: TLineInfoCacheItem.Info
element.short: The descriptive text.

element.name: CompareDebugLCLItemInfos
element.short: Compare function for the TDebugLCLItems AVL tree

element.name: CompareItemWithDebugLCLItemInfo
element.short: Compare function for .

element.name: CompareLineInfoCacheItems
element.short: Compare function for

element.name: CompareAddrWithLineInfoCacheItem
element.short: Compare function for

element.name: TStringsSortCompare
element.short: Compare function type for TStrings Strings[].

element.name: MergeSort
element.short: Sorting TStrings or TFPList.

element.name: MergeSort.List
element.short: The list to sort (overloaded type).

element.name: MergeSort.OnCompare
element.short: The sort compare function.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef
element.short: Finds an enum member by name

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.Result
element.short: The member ordinal

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.TypeInfo
element.short: The enum TypeInfo.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.Name
element.short: The member name.

element.name: GetEnumValueDef.DefaultValue
element.short: The value returned when the element was not found.

element.name: ShortCutToText
element.short: Returns the textual representation of an shortcut

element.name: TextToShortCut
element.short: Converts the textual representation of an shortcut into an shortcut

element.name: GetCompleteText
element.short: Find an string in a list, given its first few characters.

element.name: GetCompleteText.Result
element.short: The found string.

element.name: GetCompleteText.sText
element.short: The begin of the string to find.

element.name: GetCompleteText.iSelStart
element.short: The list index where the search should start.

element.name: GetCompleteText.bCaseSensitive
element.short: True means case-sensitive comparison

element.name: GetCompleteText.bSearchAscending
element.short: True means search ascending from iSelStart

element.name: GetCompleteText.slTextList
element.short: The list to search.

element.name: IsEditableTextKey.Key
element.short: The virtual key code.

element.name: FreeThenNil
element.short: Free the TObject, before setting the reference to Nil.

element.name: FreeThenNil.obj
element.short: The object reference (variable).

element.name: CallInterfaceInitializationHandlers
element.short: Invokes the registered handlers.

element.name: CallInterfaceFinalizationHandlers
element.short: Invokes the registered handlers.

element.name: OffsetRect
element.short: Increments the TopLeft and BottomRight coordinates of the rectangle.

element.name: OffsetRect.Result
element.short: True when the TopLeft coordinates are all positive.

element.name: MoveRect
element.short: Makes the rectangle originate at the given coordinates.

element.name: MoveRectToFit
element.short: Adjusts an rectangle to fit entirely into another one.

element.name: MoveRectToFit.MaxRect
element.short: The bounding rectangle.

element.name: MakeMinMax
element.short: Eventually swaps the variable contents, so that i1 is not higher than i2.

element.name: MakeMinMax.i1
element.short: Receives the minimum value of both variables.

element.name: MakeMinMax.i2
element.short: Receives the maximum value of both variables.

element.name: CalculateLeftTopWidthHeight
element.short: Converts coordinates into kind of a rectangle with positive Width and Height.

element.name: DeleteAmpersands
element.short: Replaces all '&x' with 'x', and returns the position of the first adjusted letter in the resulting string.

element.name: DeleteAmpersands.Result
element.short: Position of the first adjusted non-ampersand letter.

element.name: ComparePointers
element.short: Compares two pointers, returning the Sign of the difference.

element.name: ComparePointers.Result
element.short: +1 if p1 is higher than p2, -1 if p2 is higher than p1, 0 if both are equal.

element.name: CompareHandles
element.short: Compares two Handles, returning the Sign of the difference.

element.name: CompareLCLHandles
element.short: Compares two LCLHandles, returning the Sign of the difference.

element.name: CompareRect
element.short: Returns True when the two rectangles are equal.

element.name: ComparePoints
element.short: Compares the coordinates (y first) and returns the Sign of the difference.

element.name: CompareMethods
element.short: Returns true when both method references are equal.

element.name: RoundToInt
element.short: Returns the rounded value as an Integer.

notes.note: What if the result exceeds the Integer range?

element.name: RoundToCardinal
element.short: Returns the rounded value as an Cardinal.

notes.note: What if the result exceeds the Cardinal range?

element.name: TruncToInt
element.short: Returns the truncated value as an Integer.

notes.note: What if the result exceeds the Integer range?

element.name: TruncToCardinal
element.short: Returns the rounded value as an Cardinal.

notes.note: What if the result exceeds the Cardinal range?

element.name: StrToDouble
element.short: Converts an numeric string into an Double value.

element.name: RaiseGDBException
element.short: Raises an exception.
element.descr: Normally, GDB does not catch fpc Exception objects, therefore this procedure raises a standard divide by zero exception which is catched by GDB.

element.name: DebugLn
element.short: Writes a number of strings (heavily overloaded) to the debug output

element.name: DebugLn.S
element.short: A single string, or a Format string when followed by an argument list.

element.name: DebugLn.Args
element.short: Writes the formatted dump of the typed arguments.

element.name: ConvertLineEndings
element.short: Converts all line endings in a string into platform LineEnding.

element.name: DbgS
element.short: Formats debug output for various argument types (overloaded).

ul.li: TRect, TPoint: shows the x/y coordinates.
string, WideString: chars > #126 are translated into #nn (#nnnn) format.

element.name: DbgSName
element.short: Returns the component or class name.

element.name: DbgStr
element.short: Converts control characters or above #126 into #hex format.

element.name: DbgWideStr
element.short: Converts control characters or above #126 into #hex format.

element.name: dbgMemRange
element.short: Provides an hex dump of a memory section.

element.name: dbgMemRange.Result
element.short: The formatted dump.

element.name: dbgMemRange.P
element.short: The start address.

element.name: dbgMemRange.Count
element.short: The number of bytes to dump.

element.name: dbgMemRange.Width
element.short: The number of bytes per line, zero for no line breaks.

element.name: dbgMemStream
element.short: Provides an hex dump of an memory stream.

errors.p: The dump starts at the current stream position, the position moves to the end of the dumped range.

element.name: dbgMemStream.Count
element.short: The maximum number of bytes to dump.

element.name: dbgObjMem
element.short: Provides an hex dump of an TObject.

element.name: dbghex
element.short: Provides an hex dump of an Int64, (sign + absolute value).

element.name: DbgSWindowPosFlags
element.short: Provides an dump of SetWindowPosition flags.

element.name: DbgsVKCode
element.short: Translates an virtual key code into its VK_... name.

element.name: DbgSaveData
element.short: Writes data into an file

element.name: DbgAppendToFile
element.short: Appends a line to the given file

element.name: DbgAppendToFileWithoutLn
element.short: Appends (preformatted) text to an file

element.name: StripLN
element.short: Strips everything after (and including) an CR or LF.

element.name: TextToSingleLine
element.short: Compresses multi-line text into a single line.

descr.pre: Ensures the covenient look of multiline string when displaying it in the single line * Replaces CR and LF with spaces * Removes duplicate spaces

element.name: SwapCase
element.short: Toggles the case of all ASCII characters in an string.

element.name: UTF16String
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: PUTF16String
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UnicodeToUTF8SkipErrors

element.name: UTF8LowerCase
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF8UpperCase
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: FindInvalidUTF8Character
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: ValidUTF8String
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: AssignUTF8ListToAnsi
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF16CharacterLength
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF16Length
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF16CharacterToUnicode
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UnicodeToUTF16
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF8CompareStr
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF8CompareText
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: TConvertResult
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: TConvertOption
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: TConvertOptions
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: ConvertUTF8ToUTF16
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: ConvertUTF16ToUTF8
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF8ToUTF16
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: UTF16ToUTF8
element.short: Replaces last digits with a decimal number one higher

element.name: LCLGetLanguageIDs
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.

element.name: CreateFirstIdentifier
element.short: Replaces last digits with 1

element.name: CreateNextIdentifier
element.short: Deprecated, see for replacements.
